name: electron-tools
description: 基于 Electron 25、Vite 4、Vue 3、element-plus 2、TypeScript 5 的工具箱

scripts.electron:build: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --publish never
scripts.electron:build:release: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --publish always
scripts.electron:build:linux:deb: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --linux deb --publish never
scripts.electron:build:linux:deb:release: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --linux deb --publish always
scripts.electron:build:linux:rpm: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --linux rpm --publish never
scripts.electron:build:linux:rpm:release: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --linux rpm --publish always
scripts.electron:build:win:ia32: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --windows nsis:ia32 --publish never
scripts.electron:build:win:ia32:release: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --windows nsis:ia32 --publish always
scripts.electron:build:win:x64: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --windows nsis:x64 --publish never
scripts.electron:build:win:x64:release: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json5 --windows nsis:x64 --publish always
